text: Valery Konstantinovich Belousov (; 17 December 1948 - 16 April 2015) was a Russian professional ice hockey coach and player. He played for four teams between 1964 and 1987. At the time of his death, he was the head coach of the KHL's Traktor Chelyabinsk. Belousov was born in Novouralsk, Sverdlovsk Oblast. He died on 16 April 2015, aged 66. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Ice hockey coaches Category:Russian ice hockey players Category:People from Sverdlovsk Oblast
title: Valery Belousov
